0.title: Emergency administration of opioid antagonist to pupils and other persons.
0.description: An Act to amend 118.29 (title) and 118.29 (2) (a) 3.; and to create 118.29 (1) (dr), 118.29 (1) (dt) and 118.29 (2) (a) 2g. of the statutes; Relating to: emergency administration of opioid antagonist to pupils and other persons.

1.title: Treatment and diversion programs and making appropriations. (FE)
1.description: An Act to repeal 20.455 (2) (en); and to create 20.455 (2) (en) of the statutes; Relating to: treatment and diversion programs and making appropriations. (FE)

2.title: Immunity from revocation of probation, parole, or extended supervision for certain controlled substance offenses.
2.description: An Act to amend 961.443 (2) of the statutes; Relating to: immunity from revocation of probation, parole, or extended supervision for certain controlled substance offenses.

3.title: Prohibiting certain schedule V controlled substances from being dispensed without a prescription.
3.description: An Act to renumber 961.38 (4); to amend 961.23 (2); and to create 961.38 (4) (b) of the statutes; Relating to: prohibiting certain schedule V controlled substances from being dispensed without a prescription.

4.title: Prevention and control of, emergency and involuntary commitment for, and treatment programs and services for drug dependence. (FE)

5.title: Authorizing the director of the Office of Educational Opportunity in the University of Wisconsin System to contract for the operation of a recovery charter school, insurance coverage of mental health treatment provided by a recovery charter school, and making appropriations. (FE)
5.description: An Act to renumber and amend 118.40 (3) (f) and 118.40 (3) (g) 2.; to amend 20.255 (2) (fp), 20.255 (2) (fq), 66.0137 (4), 118.40 (2x) (e) 1., 118.40 (2x) (e) 2., 118.40 (3m) (c), 120.13 (2) (g), 185.983 (1) (intro.) and 632.87 (1); and to create 20.255 (2) (fq), 118.40 (2x) (cm), 118.40 (2x) (e) 1m., 118.40 (2x) (e) 3., 118.40 (3) (f) 2., 118.40 (3o), 120.12 (26), 609.717 and 632.87 (4m) of the statutes; Relating to: authorizing the director of the Office of Educational Opportunity in the University of Wisconsin System to contract for the operation of a recovery charter school, insurance coverage of mental health treatment provided by a recovery charter school, and making appropriations. (FE)

6.title: Grants to establish and expand graduate training in an addiction specialty and making an appropriation. (FE)
6.description: An Act Relating to: grants to establish and expand graduate training in an addiction specialty and making an appropriation. (FE)

7.title: Creating additional opioid treatment programs and making an appropriation. (FE)
7.description: An Act to amend 51.422 (1) of the statutes; Relating to: creating additional opioid treatment programs and making an appropriation. (FE)

8.title: Addiction medicine consultation program and making an appropriation. (FE)
8.description: An Act to amend 20.435 (5) (bw); and to create 51.448 of the statutes; Relating to: addiction medicine consultation program and making an appropriation. (FE)

9.title: Position authorization for criminal investigation agents at the Department of Justice. (FE)
9.description: An Act Relating to: position authorization for criminal investigation agents at the Department of Justice. (FE)

10.title: Mental health training program and making an appropriation. (FE)
10.description: An Act to create 20.255 (1) (ep) and 115.28 (63) of the statutes; Relating to: mental health training program and making an appropriation. (FE)
